data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith, Earnings Call Transcript (Q4-FY23/FY23) of the Company.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended March 31, 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Tuesday, May 30, 2023 has approved the following items:

(1) Audited financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended March 31, 2023.

(2) Recommended the Dividend @ 50% i.e. Rs. 1.00 per equity share of Rs.2 each for the financial year 2022-23 subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Earnings Call Transcript
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 and 46 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find enclosed herewith, Earnings Call Transcript (Q3-FY23) of the Company.

data.caption: Un-Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended On December 31, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Monday, 06th February, 2023 has, inter-alia considered, approved and taken on record the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2022.

Copy of the Un-audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the limited review reports (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Auditors' for the quarter/nine months ended 31st December, 2022 in the prescribed format is enclosed herewith.

The Meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 1:30 p.m. and concluded at 4:50 p.m.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On Monday, 06Th February, 2023.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Monday, 06th February, 2023 has, inter-alia considered, approved and taken on record the Un-audited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on December 31, 2022.

Copy of the Un-audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the limited review reports (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Auditors' for the quarter/nine months ended 31st December, 2022 in the prescribed format is enclosed herewith.

The Meeting of Board of Directors commenced at 1:30 p.m. and concluded at 4:50 p.m.

data.caption: Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) Of The Company For The Quarter Ended On June 30, 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Wednesday, August 10, 2022 has, inter-alia considered and approved the Unaudited Financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Company for the quarter ended on June 30, 2022.

Copy of the Un-audited financial results (Standalone and Consolidated) along with the limited review reports (Standalone and Consolidated) of the Auditors' for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 in the prescribed format are enclosed herewith.

data.news_body: In Compliance with Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015 as amended, we hereby submit the attached disclosure on Related Party Transactions, drawn in accordance with applicable accounting standards for the half year ended March 31, 2022.

data.caption: Audio Recording Of Earnings Conference Call Pertaining To The Financial Results For The Quarter And Financial Year Ended March 31, 2022.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 46 & 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, please find below the link of audio recording of earnings conference call pertaining to the financial results of the company for the Quarter and year ended March 31, 2022 held on Tuesday, May 24, 2022. The Results were approved by the board at its Meeting held on May 23, 2022.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2022.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Monday, 23rd May, 2022 has approved the following items:

(1) Audited financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022.

(2) Recommended the Dividend of Rs. 0.60 (30%) per fully paid-up equity shares of Rs.2 each for the financial year 2021-22 subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of Board Meeting
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Monday, 23rd May, 2022 has approved the following items:

(1) Audited financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2022.

(2) Recommended the Dividend of Rs. 0.60 (30%) per fully paid-up equity shares of Rs.2 each for the financial year 2021-22 subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

Please find enclosed herewith the attachments.

data.caption: Audited Financial Results (Standalone And Consolidated) For The Quarter And Year Ended 31St March, 2021.
data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Friday, 28th May, 2021 has approved the following items:
(1) Audited financial Results (Standalone and Consolidated) for the quarter and year ended 31st March, 2021.
(2) Recommended the Dividend of Rs. 0.50 (25%) per fully paid-up equity shares of Rs.2 each for the financial year 2020-21 subject to approval of the shareholders at the ensuing Annual General Meeting.

data.news_body:
Pursuant to the Regulation 33 and Regulation 30 read with Para A of Part A of schedule III of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we hereby inform that the Board of Directors in its meeting held on Friday, 28th May, 2021 has approved the following items:
